version_description: Bug fixes and user experience improvements
Bug fixes and user experience improvements

Thank you for using DeepL Translate!

What's new:
- With the DeepL Translate app, you can now listen to your text input and translation in most languages.
- You can translate speech input for most languages.
- We made improvements to the user experience and fixed bugs.

We are constantly working on improvements for our app.

Do you like the app? We would be happy if you take the time to leave a review in the App Store.
